entry.title: Schloss Reinhartshausen Wisselbrunnen Auslese 2009
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 16.95

A very high-class Auslese from Schloss Reinhartshausen which is intense, balanced and very good indeed for the price. It has the poise and character of a far more expensive wine and will be an absolute show-stopper at any dinner table.

entry.title: Schloss Reinhartshausen Estate Riesling 2012
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 12.95

The excellent estate Riesling is just what we have been looking for. A finely crafted, dry and remarkably complex Riesling at a very reasonable price. Highly recommended.

entry.title: Tenuta Giustini Fiano ‘Illuminato’ 2014
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 10.95

Quality Italian whites have enjoyed a renaissance in recent years and at the forefront is Fiano. Relatively unknown 20 years ago, it is now recognised as a grape with great potential, capable of producing deliciously aromatic, rich and fresh whites. What’s more they are still remarkably cheap. This offering from Tenuta Giustini in Puglia is the finest we’ve tried by a long shot, showing extraordinary balance and complexity for the price. A must buy

entry.title: Portal da Tojeira Vinho Verde 2014
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 7.95

Vinho Verde has been making quite a name for itself in recent years as an extraordinarily affordable, delicious summer wine. Portal da Tojeira is a very fine example – light in alcohol at 11.5% abv, with crisp acidity, fresh citrus fruits and the slight sparkle that the wine is famous for. It is exceptionally easy drinking and a bargain at £6.95 a bottle. Drink 2015 – 2016.

Was £8.95 Now £7.95

entry.title: Château La Tour Carnet, Haut-Médoc, 4ème Cru Classé 2010
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 31.95

"Probably La Tour Carnet’s best since their 2001, the 2010 La Tour Carnet exhibits wonderful ripeness, a dense ruby/purple color, notes of licorice, camphor and some toast as well as lots of black currant and blueberry fruit. It is medium to full-bodied, with attractive sweetness of tannin, good acidity, excellent delineation to its component parts, and a full-bodied, impressively long finish. This wine may close down somewhat, given the moderate tannins, but it seems relatively accessible despite being a 2010. 93 Points Robert Parker

entry.title: Tio Pepe Palomino Fino
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 6.45

"This is the sherry that demonstrates that big brands can also be good to drink. Tio Pepe is a classic, clear and bright and with a delicious salty tang. Follow my holiday tactic and make your Tio & tonic with three or four parts tonic to one of sherry. - Victoria Moore"

entry.title: Tenuta Giustini Vecchio Sogno Negroamaro 2012
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 9.95

A very exciting find from Salento in the heel of Italy. Negroamaro is a speciality of the region and this hand crafted example from the Longo family estate is rich, perfumed and far cheaper than it should be. A revelation to the uninitiated.

entry.title: Tenuta Giustini Primitivo 'Patù', Salento 2013
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 9.95

Another very exciting find from Salento in the heel of Italy. The hand-harvested grapes are given a prolonged maceration on their skins to increase the ripeness and body of the wine. The result, combined with the influence of the hot Southern Italian climate, is a stunning and rich red with complexity and intensity almost impossible to find under £10 a bottle.

entry.title: Chateau Teyssier, St-Émilion 2012 Magnum
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 39.95

entry.title: Chateau Teyssier, St-Émilion 2011 Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 16.95

Jonathan Maltus' Chateau Teyssier 2011 is a much finer wine than we were expecting (and our expectations were high…). It is packed with luscious rich fruit in much the same mould as his 2010. The price is on the button and back down to 2006/2007 levels.

Was £18.95 Now £16.95

entry.title: Temilobos Single Estate 2011
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 9.95

The Delaforce family have been at the heart of the wine business in the Douro since 1834 and the single vineyard 'Temilobos' is the flagship dry red of their estate — their pride and joy. The Douro is increasingly famed for the quality and value of its wines and the Temilobos 2011 is a magnificent example at a remarkable price.

Was £11.95 Now £9.95

entry.title: Puligny-Montrachet, Moillard-Grivot 2013
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 29.95

From one of the finest appellations within Burgundy this is a sumptuous, rich Puligny at an astonishingly good price for a wine of this quality and pedigree. Drinking well now with a good 5-7 years ahead of it. A real treat.

entry.title: Meursault, Clos des Tessons, Moillard-Grivot 2013
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 29.95

Top notch Meursault from one of the best communes within this most illustrious of Burgundian appellations. It is already starting to drink well but it will improve over the next 4 or so years. Lovely rich, buttery and slightly nutty flavours. This is a very serious white wine and all you’d expect from this excellent appellation.

entry.title: Chassagne Montrachet: Moillard-Grivot 2013
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 29.95

Where the Vineyards of Chassagne meet Montrachet is often described as the treasure at the end of the fine white Burgundian rainbow. This is very fine white Burgundy, as you would expect from this appellation of a mere 350 hectares. 2013 was a small harvest but a very good Burgundy vintage, from which it is extraordinary to find a Chassagne Montrachet for under £30.

entry.title: Coteaux Bourguignons, Moillard Grivot 2012
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 9.95

A wonderfully fresh and fruity Pinot Noir – Gamay blend from this newly created Burgundian appellation. Soft and elegant in style it nonetheless has good grip and sufficient body for drinking with food. Delicious, and a bargain for those seeking tasty red Burgundy at an everyday price.

entry.title: Summer Tasting Ticket
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 10.00

Wednesday 25th May 2016 7.00pm - 9.00pm

The Chelsea Gardener, 125 Sydney Street, SW3 6NR

Join us for the FVD Summer Wine Tasting at the Chelsea Gardener. We’ll have a selection of our most popular wines and new additions for you to taste. Also in attendance will be some of the producers to walk you through their process as well as the wines themselves.

entry.title: St.-Julien: Bordeaux 2010
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 19.95

"...it doesn't take a mastermind to work out who made the wine, and it is from a top vintage (where the Grand Vin is selling at £290 per bottle)." Tom Cannavan

An exquisite wine declassified from one of the 'Super Second' growths in the heart of St Julien—and from the great 2010 vintage. A very serious high quality Claret with a profound richness which makes it very approachable when young as well as giving it considerable longevity (10 years+). The Château wine of the same vintage sells for over £2000 a case making this a bargain.......

entry.title: The Sporting Mixed Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 149.95

The perfect selection of wines to accompany a weekends shooting and fishing.

2x Château Moulin des Richards Cuvée Prestige 2010

2x Mercurey, La Tour de Brully, Champ-Pillot, 2013

2x Château de la Négly, Languedoc La Côte 2013

2x Côtes du Rhône Villages: Domaine les Grands Bois Cuvée Maximilien Cairanne 2013

2xMontagny 1er Cru: Les Loges Vieilles Vignes 2011

1x Sipsmith Sloe Gin

1x Churchill's Finest Reserve Port NV

entry.title: Château Phélan Ségur, St-Estèphe 2010
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 39.95

One of the best Cru Bourgeois estates in St-Estèphe and a property that has been on a steady rise ever since Xavier Gardinier (Pommery & Lanson) bought it in the mid-80s . Renowned winemaker, Michel Rolland, is consultant oenologist and helps produce consistent, well balanced wines with lots of good dark fruit, and hints of coffee and tobacco. The 2010 affirms Phélan Ségur’s reputation as a real over-performer.

entry.title: Six of the Best Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 99.95

One bottle of each of the following wine

1x Pauillac, De-Classified Selection 2012
1x Mercurey, La Tour de Brully, Champ-Pillot, 2013
1x Saint-Véran, Merloix 2012
1x Ruffin et Fils Cuvée de Reserve NV
1x Churchill's Port Reserve NV
1x Haut Charmes, Sauternes 2010 Half Bottle

entry.title: Serge Mathieu, Brut Rosé Six Bottle Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 173.70

The perfect present for the Pink Champagne Lover

Discovered in an exclusive Right Bank Paris wine bar, Serge Mathieu's Champagne is a revelation and is what really good Champagne is all about.

entry.title: Serge Mathieu, Brut Rosé
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 28.95

Discovered in an exclusive Right Bank Paris wine bar, Serge Mathieu's Champagne is a revelation and is what really good Champagne is all about.

The 'Pink' made by Michel and Isabelle Mathieu is gorgeous—a beautifully made Pink Champagne that knocks spots off most of the Grand Cru Rosé Champagnes that are £10-20 a bottle more. Sadly, though, they only make a very small quantity so stocks are limited.

entry.title: Château Sainte Marie, Vieilles Vignes Entre-Deux-Mers 2014 150cl Magnum
entry.summary:
Vendor: From Vineyards Direct
Type:
Price: 19.95

Château Saint-Marie is now acknowledged as making one of the very best dry white Bordeaux in the Entre-Deux-Mers region alongside Château Bauduc & Bonnet to the post. The blend of Sauvignon (crisp lemon freshness) and Sémillon (rich & full bodied) with a dash of Muscadelle (floral scent), all from a selection of the estat'es best old vines, make the perfect affordable everyday white Bordeaux. The Dupuch family who have led the revolution in winemaking in the region have produced an exceptional 2014....well done!

entry.title: Château Sainte Marie, Vieilles Vignes Entre-Deux-Mers 2014 37.5cl Half Bottle
